html: That I may plant the heavens "To stretch out the heavens"—, In the present text it is ,לנתע , lintoa, "to plant the heavens:" the phrase is certainly very obscure, and in all probability is a mistake for ,לנטות , lintoth,. This latter is the word used in Isaiah 51:13; just before, in the very same sentence; and this phrase occurs very frequently in Isaiah, Isaiah 40:22, Isaiah 42:5, Isaiah 44:24, Isaiah 45:12; the former in no other place. It is also very remarkable, that in the Samaritan text, Numbers 24:6, these two words are twice changed by mistake, one for the other, in the same verse.
